publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-140# Fergus Ewing: Upgrading of the Mallaig Road—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the planned upgrading and improvement of the remaining single track sections of the A830 road between Mallaig and Fort William a top priority when it announces the results of the strategic roads review

S1M-140# Fergus Ewing: Upgrading of the Mallaig Road—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the planned upgrading and improvement of the remaining single track sections of the A830 road between Mallaig and Fort William a top priority when it announces the results of the strategic roads review.
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-140# Fergus Ewing: Upgrading of the Mallaig Road—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the planned upgrading and improvement of the remaining single track sections of the A830 road between Mallaig and Fort William a top priority when it announces the results of the strategic roads review. Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr John Munro*
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Tavish Scott*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-140# Fergus Ewing: Upgrading of the Mallaig Road—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the planned upgrading and improvement of the remaining single track sections of the A830 road between Mallaig and Fort William a top priority when it announces the results of the strategic roads review. Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mary Scanlon, Michael Matheson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr John Munro, Tavish Scott, Mr Jamie Stone
S1M-140# Upgrading of the Mallaig Road (lodged on 9 September 1999) Alasdair Morgan*
